message.body: Hey big brother, could Ella hang with you guys on Friday? We have a welcoming ceremony at school in the evening, I probably wouldn't come until Saturday am
Yeah no problem Meggy, mom asked me the other night. Its cool Love you
Cool, thanks big bro, school is great so far, love you, have fun
Just woke up! On my way
El is with poppa John, she didn't want to sleep here last night and he wasn't doing anything today. Aidan wants to hang out with her again
Do you guys want to go to Hershey park?
What today?!? I have to take the kids to get school clothes today then tomorrow we were gonna goto Kopona fest in Harrisburg
What is kopona feat?
It's a art show in Harrisburg along the river
Oh that sounds fun, maybe we will go with?
Yeah they have bands and food then fireworks on city island it's cool
￼See his old school shirt
Lol that's awesome!
What time today?
Whenever you guys are ready to come over. Looks like we got some rain. Aidan been looking for El
Ok, we will be over in a bit, I might be taking the 2:40 train, but we will see
Ella isn't feeling well, mom wants to know if she should just take her to Floss'
Oh no, let me call when I get off the train
Mom called, Ella is in the hospital again. They said she is doing better. Mom said you can use her car. Give her a call Love you
I talked to floss, Ella is home and ok!
That's good, glad she's better. This morn on my couch she looked all drugged up and out of it
I just got out of the eye clinic, my eyes are totally fine, I have to see a neurologist this week, but they think it's just benign positional vertigo
or maybe it's the bacon
Love you
What's moms password for her gmail?? She wants to be on the Internet
I think it's Meganandchris
Haha, And I know, it probably is withdraw
Yeah she is like I want to see it, she thinks there is something to show us lol
Nope not it
Chrisandmegan
Haha, that crazy Internet
￼Missing you
￼Check this place out
Moms there with no key
￼In Georgia.....
Are you or Ella coming up for the millersville parade tomorrow ??
No, Ella has a Girl Scouts celebration hike to go on. I wish we could come!
Aww that's cool though, she could have rode in the parade with Darian. Well tell her I said to have fun on her hike Love ya
Ok, will do. I think we are coming to lanc that night, I need to talk to mom, but I want to look for a car
That's cool, if you need anything let me know
Have you been thinking of what we can do for your mom's birthday?
It was the steam punk guy that bought stuff from the Oddities people. His house is fuckin awsome
Lol that was for Alana, but did you ever see that show?
Haha, no what show?
Oddities, it's a shop in NY that sells crazy ####
Haha no I've never seen it. Is it online
Not sure, I will DVR a few episodes, theses people come into the shop looking for some crazy shit, some of them try to sell them some shit lol
Hey big brother, next Sunday, floss is having a bday party for Ella at her house, and wants to know if her cousins can come. It's a two o clock, let me know! Love u!
No sorry it's Saturday
Yeah they would love that!! Cool
Oh awesome, Ella will be stoked
The kids will be too
Did you hear Colorado and Washington voted to legalize recreational possession and use!!
Yes! It's amazing..I know where we are going on vacation, ha
Hell yeah!!
How's El doing??
She's ok, we are staying over again. Her cold and her asthma are working together to keep her oxygen level down.
Aww poor kid, tell her uncle Chris says she has to get better for her birthday
I know, sick on her bday!
Is El home?? How's she doing?
Hey what time is the party tomorrow??
It's at two!
Oh shoot didn't realize it was so late!! Be there shortly!!
Not exactly sure where I'm going
Aw! Sorry, Nate took me hiking for my birthday, I did t have very good reception. I'm glad you guys made it!! Xo
Hey Hey!! Happy Birthday!! I love you Meggy
Thanks big brother, love u too!
What a wonderful world!
Ooohhhhh yeaaaaahhhhh........
￼He just got his Bobcat badge
Are you two going to moms ??
That's great!!!! No, I have a paper due thanksgiving day, so mom is going to come visit us tomorrow
Happy Thanksgiving to you!!
You too big brother!! Miss you guys!
Merry Christmas Meggy I love you!! When are you coming up?
Merry Christmas!!! Love you guys. We just finished opening everything and are going to have breakfast
Mom said to be here around three, if that is ok?
Happy New Year!!!! I hope you have a good night and a great year!! I love you! See you tomorrow
Happy b day big brother! Love u guys!!!!
Haha I said b day
That is funny lil sis lol
Too much champagne.... How was your new year?
Hey Meggy how you doing??
Hey big brother! All is good with us! How are you guys? Miss and love u! Xo
Hey big brother, I'm getting scuba training for school! We can dive together! Miss u, love you!
Cool little sister that sounds like fun. We should plan a nice tropical dive trip
I heard Ella is gonna come up this summer. Miss you and love you too
Hey, I'm going to ask mom to watch Ella the weekend of the 15th, you'll have the kids that weekend, right? So she can see her cousins!
Yep I sure do, they would love to see their cousin Love you
Love you too!
Mom told me you are going to watch Ella on Friday, thanks so much! I forgot its moms bday, oops!
No problem, I wanted to do something for her birthday but not sure what
Yeah, I know, she is hard to gift
You got that right! Are you gonna be around at all this weekend?
I'm not sure. I might come on Monday, but it will have to be after school. I want to come for a whole weekend soon. We should stay at the indoor water park again!
Oh yeah that would be cool!! Before they get to old for that
Yeah..everyone could use a pool day in the middle of winter! And they are old enough that we could just sit in the hot tub ha ha
Now your thinking, with the non descriptive large plastic jugs of "juice"
Yes!!!
Turkey hill gallon jugs, ha!
A little piece of Jersey Shore right here in Lancaster lol
￼Check out my rental in Georgia
Wow, pretty swank!
Hey do you know Andrea Shutter? She was one of the Dutchland Rollers
I can't remember, the name sounds kind of familiar, why?
Oh no reason, just thinking about a old friend and never asked if you two knew each other
Happy valentines day to you and Ella I love you both
Love you too! Miss you!
￼Hope you had a nice valentines day
￼Look I did glass blowing class, Alana got it on living social. I made a flower lol Next time I'm gonna make a new bong!!
Haha, nice! Where was it?
Actually it was in Columbia it was cool. I will show you then. Is Ella doing anything next weekend? I want to have a little party for Aidan
Actually, Ella will be at flosses next weekend, when did you want to do something?
￼Happy St. Patrick's Day
Happy birthday big brother! Love you, wish we were there!
Thanks Meggy, we didn't do much but had some lasagne. It was good!!
Love you all!!
Oh yum, lasagna! I'm glad you had a good birthday. You need to come here when my school is done and neither of us have kids for a weekend, we will pub crawl!
Hey lil sis Happy Easter!! Gotta do the pub crawl with the weather getting nicer. Love you!!
Yes! Happy Easter, we had pizza, haha
Hey is Ella still gonna be able to goto camp with the cousins this summer? Mom said she's going to Maine, but she also said you have classes over the summer
Yeah, she wants to stay with mom for a week, when are the kids going?
Not sure that's why I wanted to see when is good for you
Mom is in the hospital overnight, she had a stroke but she seems ok. I don't know much more I love you
I just talked to her. So crazy. Ella is supposed to go camping w Girl Scouts but we might come down instead
Hey mom is released we are at the house now
Ok, we are driving, so you guys in an hour or so
Alright, mom is laying down now she is really tired See you guys soon Love you!
Traffics nuts, we may be longer, but see u eventually love u!!
How's the trip? The cousins ate excited to see y'all
We took a break at the rest stop, it was a car accident blocking the lane. We are excited to see you guys too!!!
Bring beer ha
Are u coming over? We are going to leave soon
Yeah I'm on my way now
